title: Logical and for Functions
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the concept of higher-order functions in JavaScript. Specifically, we will focus on creating a function that checks if two given functions return true for a given set of arguments using the logical and operator. Through this lab, you will gain a deeper understanding of how to manipulate functions in JavaScript and how to use them to write more complex and efficient code.

meta.title: Higher-Order Functions in JavaScript | Logical AND
meta.description: Explore the concept of higher-order functions in JavaScript and learn how to use the logical AND operator to create efficient code.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, higher-order functions, logical AND, programming, coding
